chat.client

Interface ActionsMessages


  • public interface ActionsMessages
    The interface that every wants to make actions when the client receive a message must complains.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionError(java.lang.String error)
      This method is called when the client receives an error at the login.
      void newMessage(DataMessage message)
      This method is called when the client receives a new message to be saved by the server.
      void setMessages(java.util.List<DataMessage> messages)
      This method is called when the client receives a new set of messages to replace the current messages.
      void setUsers(java.util.List<DataUser> users)
      This method is called when the client receives the new list of users by the server.
